CustomField.formula: IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(Party__r.Document_Type__c, 'Alt'), AND(Party__r.Legal_Entity_Type__c == 'Individual', ISPICKVAL(Document_Type__c, 'Alt'), Employment_Information__c != NULL)), IF(ISPICKVAL(Accountant_Letter_Verified__c, 'Yes'), OR(ISPICKVAL(Accountant_Call__c, 'No'), ISPICKVAL(Accountant_Call__c, '')), FALSE), FALSE)
CustomField.label: Accountant Call Warning Check
